# Effect size

## Gathering information:

Participants:
1) Schizophrenia n = 43
n = 23 group 1: duration schizophrenia < 10 years
n = 20 group 2: duration schizophrenia > 10 years

2)  Control n = 20


Contrast sensitivity (p2-3)
1) SF = 0.4
Control: mean = 15.2 ; sd = 12.0
Schizophrenia: mean = 10.1 ; sd = 8.1
p = 0.001

2) SF = 3.6
Control: mean = 73.4 ; sd = 39.8
Schizophrenia: mean = 64.4 ; sd = 40.7
p = 0.02

3) SF = 17.9
Control: mean = 16.4 ; sd = 13.1
Schizophrenia: mean = 16.1 ; sd = 13.4 
p = 0.9 (not significant)

The contrast sensitivities for group 1 and group 2 of schizophrenia based on disease duration is also given in the article. Not applicable.


## Calculate effect size:
use the mean and sd (see bookdown.org)

###  SF = 0.4
Control: mean = 15.2 ; sd = 12.0
Schizophrenia: mean = 10.1 ; sd = 8.1
```{r}
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf0.4 <- esc_mean_sd(grp1m = 15.2, grp2m = 10.1,  # group mean
            grp1sd = 12.0, grp2sd = 8.1, # group sd
            grp1n = 43, grp2n = 20, 
            es.type = "g")
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf0.4
```

###  SF = 3.6
Control: mean = 73.4 ; sd = 39.8
Schizophrenia: mean = 64.4 ; sd = 40.7
```{r}
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf3.6 <- esc_mean_sd(grp1m = 73.4, grp2m = 64.4,  # group mean
            grp1sd = 39.8, grp2sd = 40.7, # group sd
            grp1n = 43, grp2n = 20, 
            es.type = "g")
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf3.6
```

### SF = 17.9
Control: mean = 16.4 ; sd = 13.1
Schizophrenia: mean = 16.1 ; sd = 13.4
```{r}
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf17.9 <- esc_mean_sd(grp1m = 16.4, grp2m = 16.1,  # group mean
            grp1sd = 13.1, grp2sd = 13.4, # group sd
            grp1n = 43, grp2n = 20, 
            es.type = "g")
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf17.9
```

Also possible to calculate the m and sd from Figure 1, but this is prone to error, thus not necessary.

## Summarizing table
```{r}
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013 <- tibble(es = shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf0.4$es, se = shoshina_and_shelepin_2013_es_sf0.4$se ) 

shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$study <- "Shoshina and Shelepin. 2013"
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$method <- "staircase"
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$medication <- "medicated" #n=43 medicated
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$cpz <- NA
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$task <- "2IFC"
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$SF <- "0.4, 3.6, 17.9"
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$size <- NA
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$BPRS <- NA
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$motion <- FALSE 
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$duration <- NA 
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$location <- NA
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$lapses <- FALSE 
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$calculation_statistic <- "m and sd"  
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$calculation_data <- "reported" 
shoshina_and_shelepin_2013$calculation_certainty <- "unsure" #scale is "sure", "unsure", "very unsure"

shoshina_and_shelepin_2013
```
